bibl.title: Callimachus, The Victoria Berenices and Roman Poetry.
bibl.note: I. The Proem of the Third Georgic. - II. Propertius 3. 1. - III. Statius, Silvae 3. 1. - IV. The Victoria Berenices. - V. Catullus 64. - Part of this paper was delivered in March 1980 at a conference on Alexandrianism held in Ann Arbor, Michigan.
Thomas Richard F., Callimachus, The Victoria Berenices and Roman Poetry.
